${ModID}:MakeshiftSword.NAME: Makeshift Sword
${ModID}:MakeshiftSword.DESCRIPTION: 每当 一张牌 is created during combat, 获得 !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:MakeshiftShield.NAME: Makeshift Shield
${ModID}:MakeshiftShield.DESCRIPTION: 每当 一张牌 is created during combat, 获得 !M! 点 格挡 。

${ModID}:PaintBrush.NAME: Paint Brush
${ModID}:PaintBrush.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} card with selected type and cost.

${ModID}:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
${ModID}:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: {@@}{!Upgrades!|>0=固有 。 NL }When a Status card is created, NL 消耗 it.

${ModID}:Souvenirs.NAME: Souvenirs
${ModID}:Souvenirs.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Create an *Insight, *Smite or *Safety in hand. It draws 一张牌。 {!Upgrades!|>0= NL Do it a获得.}

${ModID}:Mimicry.NAME: Mimicry
${ModID}:Mimicry.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} common card from other Packs you've selected.

${ModID}:CraftyMove.NAME: Crafty Move
${ModID}:CraftyMove.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 If 一张牌 has been created 本回合, 获得 [E] and 抽一张牌。

${ModID}:BarrierBeacon.NAME: Barrier Beacon
${ModID}:BarrierBeacon.DESCRIPTION: {@@}获得 !B! Block, create a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} copy of this in hand. 消耗 。

${ModID}:StrikingStrike.NAME: Striking Strike
${ModID}:StrikingStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Discover a{!Upgrades!|>0=n upgraded} strike. It 消耗s when played and costs 0 本回合.

${ModID}:AccumulativeStrike.NAME: Accumulative Strike
${ModID}:AccumulativeStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your {!Upgrades!|0= non-Status} created cards.
